sections.content: 2080 AD - Class system is born, managed by WISDOM
2100 AD - “French Fry” leads an unsuccessful revolution
2157 AD - “Bean” learns about the apocalypse, veterans, and revolution from an unnamed veteran
2160 AD - Last remaining veterans of the apocalypse die
2162 AD - Roger becomes President of America
2163 AD - “Bean” meets “Chilli” for the first time and learns about the Revolutionists
2164 AD - Joanne assumes the position of CEO of WISDOM
2170 AD - “Bean” becomes leader of the Revolutionists
2172 AD - Bean and Chilli contact Harper (Tomato) and convert her to a Revolutionist
